title: Chicken Prosciutto Rolls
ingredients: ['6 skinless, boneless chicken breast fillets', '4 tablespoons olive oil', '75g finely chopped', 'salt and pepper to taste', '2 tablespoons ground sage', '450g thinly sliced prosciutto', '50g butter', '250ml dry white wine', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh sage leaves', 'salt and pepper to taste', '1 teaspoon cornflour', 'water as needed']
